original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sitthāvakārakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe…

analyzed: ▁na ▁si tth āva kārak aṃ ▁ bhuñj issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sitthāvakārakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁si tth āva kārak aṃ ▁bhuñja ti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
▁ka ca var aṃ ▁chaḍḍ ento ▁si tth aṃ ▁chaḍḍ a yati
